faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.subtitle: Have questions about MSeller Cloud? Find answers to common questions about our ERP platform.

items.question: What makes MSeller different from other ERP systems?
items.answer: MSeller combines comprehensive functionality with a mobile-first design. Our cloud-based platform provides real-time access to customer data, inventory, sales, and analytics from any device.

items.question: Can I manage multiple locations with MSeller?
items.answer: Yes! MSeller supports multi-location inventory management, territory-based sales tracking, and location-specific reporting to help you coordinate operations across all your business locations.

items.question: Does MSeller work on mobile devices?
items.answer: Absolutely. MSeller is designed with a mobile-first approach, providing full functionality on phones and tablets. Your team can process orders, check inventory, and access customer data on the go.

items.question: What kind of reports can I generate?
items.answer: MSeller offers custom reports with advanced filtering by date, seller, location, distributor, payment type, and more. Export data in multiple formats and create real-time dashboards to track your KPIs.

items.question: How does user management work?
items.answer: MSeller includes role-based access control allowing you to assign specific permissions based on user roles. You can manage sellers, track individual performance, and control access to sensitive data.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes. MSeller uses enterprise-grade security with encrypted data storage, secure authentication, audit logging, and compliance with data protection regulations.

items.question: Can I import my existing data?
items.answer: Yes! MSeller supports bulk data import for customers, products, and inventory. Our team can help you migrate your existing data during onboarding.

items.question: What payment methods does MSeller support?
items.answer: MSeller handles multiple payment types including cash, credit, checks, and electronic transfers. Track all payment history and reconcile transactions easily.
